item.title: RT by @SimoneGiertz: also here‚Äôs a fun fact that people don‚Äôt like to talk about: sex isn‚Äôt evil. no one deserves to suffer because they had sex. people are allowed to have it. and you can do everything right and still end up pregnant. and you shouldn‚Äôt be forced to carry it if you don‚Äôt want to.
